phase3.thread.InvertColorsAsyncTask



class InvertColorsAsyncTask: phase3.thread.AsyncTask.AsyncTask!(RGBColor[][]).AsyncTask;
Inverts all of the Colors in a 2-dimensional RGBColor array.

Authors:
Zachery Burris (zburris@uncc.edu) and Richard Voelker (rvoelker@uncc.edu)

Date:
April 21, 2014

this(Display display, Shell mainShell, RGBColor[][] colors);
Creates a new InvertColorsAsyncTask.

Params:
Display display The main Display of the application.
Shell mainShell The main Shell of the application.
RGBColor[][] colors The RGBColor array.

Date:
April 21, 2014
